output:
I'm telling you this just the way it happens
Because I share the vice with all men
Of all the women happily married and still in love with my wife
I give all of the change in heaven
I smash the front of your head like a hand sacker
And I get lost in a beautiful, desperately in love with her
I blow off in an elevator
I'm playing count to the 8 by a unicorn
She's the stencil to the hat
She's up on the 10th floor
She takes my heart with her
I remember once falling in love with my wife
She was down to last
She was, she was cute
